review_title: Very rewarding experience- also very emotional work
pros: You get to know disabled and handicapped people - mentally and physically - and learn a lot about yourself and what people are capable of overcoming. Everyone has been very nice, the atmosphere is more familiar and relaxed. You can negotiate flexible hours as well.
cons: Lots of work, demanding and challenging mentally as well as sometimes physically (depending on your job). You have to be really really patient.
